name: INIT.
description:
Init. will test your ability to see through illusion and discover innovative and cerebral challenges that can be solved as simply as changing the way you perceive them.

Features

* Over 40 unique and challenging constructs
* Bring along a friend and overcome special split-screen objective-based missions
* Melt into an ethereal soundtrack and succumb to binaural manipulation
* Use 'Root Access' to modify constructs and reveal secret areas by reconstructing the environment around you
* Delve deeper into the mysterious Invertica system and discover a terrifying global agenda
